Arms.name: Bicep curl
Arms.description: Hold dumbbells and have arms by your side. Keep your elbows close to the body. Rotate so palms of hands face forward. Keep elbows in one place and raise weights until dumbbells are at shoulder level.

Arms.name: Hammer curl
Arms.description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing your sides and arms extended straight down. Keeping your upper arms against your sides, curl both weights at the same time, minimizing momentum used during the curl.

Arms.name: Dip
Arms.description: Use dip bars if available, or place your palms on a bench, chair  or floor and extend legs in front of you. Lower your body until your upper arms are parallel to the floor, but no lower. Extend your elbows to come up.

Legs.name: Regular Dumbbell Squat
Legs.description: Hold dumbbells at sides with legs medium spaced. Crouch down like you're sitting.
